overview: Wu Daming is a lonely loser who has repeatedly frustrated his family business in the mid-life crisis. After experiencing being deceived by unscrupulous bosses, failing to pay, failing to apply for a wall, and feelings of a bottleneck with his wife, Wu Daming accidentally got a magical pill named "Super Capsule". With this tablet, I have acquired four super powers, but I have not obtained the happiness I want. When I was in myth, I suddenly realized that it was just a dream. In fact, happiness is around me.
title: Super Tablet
